/$
$
Frequently Asked Questions
/$
$
Do we accept pets?
Yes! We accept pets. We require all pet owners to sign a liability form. The pets we do not accept include but are not limited to:,
Large reptiles (snakes, lizards, alligators)
Farm animals (goats, pigs, roosters, etc.)
Exotic cats (like servals, bobcats)
Birds that are excessively loud
​
Are we an all ages park?
Yes, we accept all ages into our park.
​
Do we have after hours check in?
Yes, we have check in available until midnight. This will be done with our on site security guard.
​
Do we have seasonal rates?
Yes, from January 15 to March 15 anyone who checks in will not be offered month to month rates. They have to pay two months in advance the day they check in or pay week by week. Please contact out office for pricing.
​
What is the largest RV we accept?
The largest RV we can accept is 45ft in length.
​
What is the oldest RV we accept?
The park accepts RVs that are no more than 12 years old, based on the current calendar year.
​
​
Do we offer discounts?
No, our park does not offer discounts
